game_description: CoasterMania is a physics-based VR rollercoaster game where you create the ride of your life! Use wacky contraptions and elements to fly through the sky, then experience your creation by jumping in the front seat. SANDBOX MODE: Build your dream rollercoaster without any rules but the rules of physics. When you're done, share your coaster or experience the engineering marvels of others. Design your own rides and upload them online PASSTHROUGH MODE: Place your rollercoaster in the real world & build a track all around your house. PUZZLE MODE: Coming soon! ONLINE SHARING: Infinite replayability with lots of depth. Access unlimited community-made rollercoasters in Online Sharing. ADDITIONAL FEATURES: - Terrain editor. - Decorate the environment with trees, rocks, and other props.
review_1: Coaster Mania is about an amazing way to take advantage of the passthrough of the Quest 2. This game is even made that much better if you are playing currently on a Quest Pro and in the future of a Quest 3 to utilize the color passthrough. You are able to create your own roller coaster with drops, turns, twists, and barrel rolls all in a virtual or mixed reality environment. The game is very easy to build your coasters with and very kid friendly too, making this game fun for all ages. You can decorate your own environment with various objects such as trees to add to the scenery of your awesome ride! Once you have built your perfect roller coaster you can take it for a ride and experience what it would be like to really be on it! I really think this might be the future of riding roller coasters! You can also share and upload your finished coaster so other people can ride it via the community board, which is a great feature for hundreds of different coaster so the fun never ends! The thing that i would like to see is if you could add a friend to the coaster top ride with you. I also would like to be able to ride my coaster in my mixed reality environment. I might have missed it but it seemed that i could only ride it in the virtual world. Other than that its a great game for a good price!
